website_summaries.verdict: Classic style meets tons of functionality and durability. Solid white blends well with a variety of interior decor styles.
pros: The more traditional appearance of the bed looks solid without taking a lot of space in the bedroom
The included ladder is sturdy for children of many sizes
cons: Assembly time can take longer than other options—up to two hours

customer_reviews.title: Happy customers

customer_reviews.title: I put it together by myself in about an hour and a half I'm pretty strong and I am a mechanic by trade

customer_reviews.title: Happy, would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service

product_meta.title: Dorel Living Moon Bay Loft Bed, Twin, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteWatch your child’s face light up with delight when they get to customize their very own personal space with the Your Zone Loft Bed. This fun loft bed for kids makes an inviting and creative bedroom that is both space saving and functional. Use the convenient area under the loft bed for extra storage, for a play or sitting area, or add a desk to create a great workspace for homework. The loft bed features a sturdy pine wood construction and solid wood panel design on the headboard and footboard. The loft bed also has pine slats to provide enhanced support for the mattress. Safety features include a 5-step ladder which can be mounted on either side and a full-length guardrail to give you piece of mind while they sleep. Let your child’s creativity run wild with the Your Zone Loft Bed.
feature_bullets: Panel design on headboard and footboard
